name: Parliament Member
description:
It is a card game! WIth emergent gameplay

Html loads slowly and you'll need to reloadthe page for a clean restart so it is recomended to download the game.

Made in Godot Wild Jam #22 Theme Revolution.

Design: Verbante and Öykü Çetiner

Code: Verbante

Music: Xenolumina

Known Issues:

- Year doesn't reload properly, you will have to restart the game

- Many bugs in the UI

- Game size is very big

I'll upload a fix soon :)
